name: crctistrl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ccrcts, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: simpld(wbr(c0, cfv(ccrcts, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), cfv(c2, cfv(chash, c0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ccrcts, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ccrcts, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), cfv(c2, cfv(chash, c0)))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(Circuits ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(Circuits ` c1)]c2 →(c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 ∧(c2 ` 0)=(c2 `(# ` c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ccrcts, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ccrcts, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), cfv(c2, cfv(chash, c0)))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(Circuits ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(Circuits ` c1)]c2 →(c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 ∧(c2 ` 0)=(c2 `(# ` c0))))

body.origin: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ccrcts, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), cfv(c2, cfv(chash, c0)))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ccrcts, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))

comment: A circuit is a trail. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 31-Jan-2021.)
